DOC.brief_summary: To compare the antitumor efficacy and toxicity of Idarubicin and cytarabine in combination with or not with infusions of granulocyte colony-stimulating factor-mobilized HLA-mismatched donor peripheral blood stem cells in patients with newly diagnosed high-risk acute myeloid leukemia (AML).
DOC.brief_title: HLA-mismatched Microtransplantation for High Risk Acute Myeloid Leukemia
DOC.criteria: 1. Having signed informed consent 2. Diagnosis was based on the FrenchAmericanBritish (FAB) and WHO criteria. 3. Age ≥ 7 years old 4. Age ＜ 60 years old 1.Patients with a blast crisis of chronic myeloid leukemia or acute promyelocytic leukemia
